mapper.select: select qna_no, user_id, title, content, write_date, response_content, response_date from (select ceil(rownum / 7) as page, qna_no, user_id, title, content, write_date, response_content, response_date from (select q.qna_no as qna_no,q.user_id,q.title,q.content,q.write_date,r.response_content,r.response_date from qna q, qna_response r where q.qna_no=r.qna_no(+) order by qna_no desc)) where page = #{pageNo}

select a.notice_no -- 글번호 , a.title -- 제목 , a.write_date -- 작성일 , a.nwriter -- 작성자 , b.num from notice a /* 공지사항 */ inner join ( select rownum as num -- 순번 , notice_no -- 글번호 from notice) b /* 공지사항 */ on a.notice_no = b.notice_no where b.num between ((#{pageNo} * 7) - 6) and (#{pageNo} * 7)
select x.area_name, p.* from place p, (select a.area_name, c.* from course c, area a where a.area like substr(c.trip_no,0,2) and a.area_name=#{areaName}) x where p.place_no like x.place_no
mapper.update: update trip set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where trip_no = #{trip_no}
mapper.select: select concat(substr(trip_no,1,2),(cast(substr(trip_no,3,4) as int)+1)) as num from ( select trip_no from trip where substr(trip_no,0,2) like (select area from area where area_name=#{area}) order by trip_no desc) where rownum = 1
mapper.delete: delete from course where trip_no like #{trip_no}
